device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
devices_included: Phone; Desktop computer; Laptop; Projector; PDA; Printer
use_cases_desc: a conferencing groupware and delivering presentation materials to a class
contribution_desc:
This paper presents a proxy-based, XML framework that delivers the appropriate partial view of a requested Web page to each user's set of devices. The architecture consists of an XML metadata policy file defining access privileges to XML tags on a Web page, a middleware proxy that splits XML Web content to create partial views, and a client-side component.

Contribution: "multi-device" -> "toolkit, middleware" -> "UI distribution".
use_cases: Collaboration; Web browsing; Education; classroom presentation
